# Setup do Mac usando o Homebrew

## Homebrew

```{bash eval=FALSE}
/bin/bash -c "$(curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Homebrew/install/HEAD/install.sh)"
```

## Adicionar ao shell (.zshrc ou .bashrc):

```{bash eval=FALSE}         
echo 'eval "$(/opt/homebrew/bin/brew shellenv)' >> ~/.zshrc"
source ~/.zshrc
```

## Ferramentas de linha de comando

``` {bash eval=FALSE}        
brew install git wget curl pandoc tree
```

## Configurar o Git

```{bash eval=FALSE}
git config --global user.name "Gustavo Givisiez"
git config --global user.email "gh_naves@id.uff.br"
git config --global core.editor "code --wait"
```

## Apps gráficos

```{bash eval=FALSE}       
brew install --cask iterm2 visual-studio-code
```

## R e RStudio

```{bash  eval=FALSE}       
brew install --cask r
brew install --cask rstudio
```

### Criar ambiente virtual para ser usado no R:

```{bash eval=FALSE}
mkdir -p ~/projects ~/envs/python ~/bin
# ambiente “ds” (venv) e pacotes básicos
python3 -m venv ~/envs/python/ds
source ~/envs/python/ds/bin/activate
pip install --upgrade pip
pip install jupyterlab ipykernel numpy pandas matplotlib seaborn scikit-learn
pip install jupyterlab-git black ruff isort pytest

# registra o kernel no Jupyter com nome amigável
python -m ipykernel install --user --name "python-ds" --display-name "Python (ds)"
deactivate
```


### Para ativar o Python depois
```{bash eval=FALSE}       
source ~/envs/python/ds/bin/activate
jupyter lab
```

## PyCharm
```{bash eval=FALSE}      
brew install --cask pycharm-ce
# ou Professional (paga, com recursos extras)
# brew install --cask pycharm
```

## Python Global
```{bash eval=FALSE}
brew install python
pip3 install jupyterlab ipykernel numpy pandas matplotlib seaborn scikit-learn
brew install --cask pycharm-ce

# Priorizar esse Python como instalação global
eval "$(/opt/homebrew/bin/brew shellenv)"
source ~/.zshrc
```

```{bash eval=FALSE}
# para ver quais Pythons estão instalados
which -a python3
```

## QGIS

### Roseta

```{bash eval=FALSE}

```

### Qgis

```{bash  eval=FALSE}

```

## Atualizações periódicas

```{bash eval=FALSE}

```

```{bash eval=FALSE}

```
